scripts.need: npm run && cd src && npm run && npm run dll && npm run dev
scripts.delete: if exist D:\package\CloudLink-win32-ia32\ rd /s /q D:\package\CloudLink-win32-ia32\ && if exist D:\package\HuaweiMeeting-win32-ia32\ rd /s /q D:\package\HuaweiMeeting-win32-ia32\ && if exist D:\package\package-tool\ rd /s /q D:\package\package-tool\
scripts.electronpackage: electron-packager ./ --win32metadata.ProductName=HuaweiMeeting --win32metadata.FileDescription=HuaweiMeeting --win32metadata.OriginalFilename=HuaweiMeeting.exe --win32metadata.CompanyName="Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd." --win32metadata.InternalName=HuaweiMeeting.exe  --appCopyright="Copyright (c) Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. 2010-2019. All rights reserved."  --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --out d:/package --icon=./resources/icon/WeLinkSoftClient.ico --electron-version 1.8.4 --overwrite --ignore="(src|demo|CI|babel|package-tool-mac|restart\.vbs|dev\.js|\.git|\.md|\.xls|\.xlsx|ws_service\.log|yarn\.lock|ws_service\.log|package-tool|bundle\.js\.map|style\.css\.map|test|\.vscode|release-server|out_mobile|mobile.hot\.js|dev.hot\.js|ios.hot\.js|startIos\.js|selfSoft|pdb|logscan|Tools|refactor_tool)" --no-prune && rd /s /q D:\package\HuaweiMeeting-win32-ia32\resources\app\node_modules\
scripts.encrypt: xcopy .\package-tool\whitebox.ini D:\package\CloudLink-win32-ia32\  /y  &&   D: && cd  D:\package\package-tool\ && start encrypt.exe && ping -n 30 -w 1000 localhost > nul
scripts.build: yarn buildInfo && yarn delete && yarn copytools && yarn workerpackage && yarn webpackage && yarn electronpackage && yarn rename && yarn copyTup && yarn encrypt && yarn replaceCloudec && yarn  compil && yarn  opendir
scripts.electronpackage-mac: node ./package-tool-mac/replace_electron_packager.js && electron-packager ./package-tool-mac/app  --appname=cloudlink --appCopyright="Copyright (c) Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. 2010-2018. All rights reserved."  --platform=mas --protocols=[\{\"name\":\"welinksoftclient\",\"schemes\":[\"welinksoftclient\"]\},\{\"name\":\"welink\",\"schemes\":[\"welink\"]\},\{\"name\":\"cloudlink\",\"schemes\":[\"cloudlink\"]\}] --protocol-name=ss --out=./package-tool-mac/out_mac --electron-version=1.8.4 --overwrite --no-prune && cp -R ./package-tool-mac/CloudLink.icns ./package-tool-mac/out_mac/CloudLink-mas-x64/CloudLink.app/Contents/Resources/ && cp -R ./package-tool-mac/fontlist ./package-tool-mac/out_mac/CloudLink-mas-x64/CloudLink.app/Contents/Resources/app && node ./package-tool-mac/replace_mac_icon.js && node ./package-tool-mac/add_open_source_notify.js
scripts.build_debug: yarn delete && yarn copytools && yarn workerpackage && yarn webpackage_debug && yarn electronpackage && yarn rename && yarn encrypt &&  yarn  compil && yarn  opendir
scripts.CIbuild: npm run buildInfo && npm run  delete && npm run  copytools && npm run workerpackage && npm run  webpackage && npm run electronpackage && yarn rename && yarn copyTup && npm run encrypt
scripts.CIbuild_debug: npm run  delete && npm run  copytools && npm run workerpackage && npm run  webpackage_debug && npm run electronpackage && yarn rename && npm run encrypt
scripts.androidbuild: npm run buildMobileInfo && cd src && npm run androidbuild && cd .. && npm run copylibs
scripts.androidbuild_debug: cd src && npm run androidbuild_debug && cd .. && npm run copylibs
scripts.androiddebugformac: cd src && npm run androidbuild_debug && cd .. && npm run copylibsformac
scripts.androidbuildformac: cd src && npm run androidbuild && cd .. && npm run copylibsformac
scripts.iosbuild: cd src && npm run iosbuild && cd .. && npm run copylibs
scripts.iosdebugformac: cd src && npm run iosdebug && cd .. && npm run copylibsformac
scripts.macbuild: npm run buildInfo && cd src && npm run macbuild
scripts.iosbuildCI: npm run buildMobileInfo && cd src && npm run iosbuild && cd .. && npm run copylibsformac
scripts.iosopensdkdebugCI: npm run buildMobileInfo && cd src && npm run iosopensdkdebug && cd .. && npm run copylibs
scripts.iosopensdk: npm run buildMobileInfo && cd src && npm run iosopensdk && cd .. && npm run copylibs
scripts.iosopensdkformac: npm run buildMobileInfo && cd src && npm run iosopensdk && cd .. && npm run copylibsformac
scripts.androidopensdkdebugformac: cd src && npm run androidopensdkdebug  && cd .. && npm run copylibsformac
scripts.androidopensdkreleaseformac: cd src && npm run androidopensdk && cd ..  && npm run copylibsformac
scripts.androidopensdkrelease: cd src && npm run androidopensdk && cd ..  && npm run copylibs
scripts.bigwinbuild: yarn delete && yarn copybigwintools && yarn workerpackage && yarn bigwinwebpackage && yarn electronpackage && yarn rename && yarn encrypt &&  yarn  bigwincompil && yarn  opendir
scripts.CIBigWinBuild: npm run  delete && npm run  copybigwintools && npm run workerpackage && npm run  bigwinwebpackage && npm run electronpackage && yarn rename && npm run encrypt
scripts.SVG组件化预览: cd Tools/SVG组件化预览 && yarn && yarn build
scripts.SVG组件化预览 dev: cd Tools/SVG组件化预览 && yarn && yarn start
scripts.refactor: yarn model-pre-split && yarn split-modules  && yarn move-files
scripts.refactorCI: npm run model-pre-split && npm run hande-write && npm run split-modules  && npm run move-files  && npm run api-export
scripts.clean: git checkout src && git clean -df src/api && git clean -df src/module
